page.title: 17RIGHT OF WAY
page.content: The edge of the town is a good place to relax and get away from the buildings. We think that we are fortunate to live in a town that is surrounded with peaceful countryside. There are quiet country roads and also footpaths where we can get away from the cars. Along the paths you can see alf wildlife if you are quiet. The modern farms turn several small fields into one large field. This makes the farmer's job easier but it makes the paths less interesting. It is hard to beve that the paths were once the routes people to get to work or to go to the market or the only way to get to their house.
